javadoc: Class to manage a hierarchy of menus.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the menu.

params.name: mnemonicKey
params.comment: the key to use for the menu mnemonic

params.name: group
params.comment: the group of the menu.

params.name: usePopupPath
params.comment: if true, registers actions with popup paths as popup items.

params.name: menuHandler
params.comment: Listener to be notified of menu behavior.

params.name: menuGroupMap
params.comment: maps menu groups to menu paths

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Constructs a new MenuManager at the given level. The level corresponds to how deep this menu
 is within other menus.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of this menu.

params.name: menuPath
params.comment: the path of the menu item represented by this menu manager.

params.name: mnemonicKey
params.comment: the key to use for the menu mnemonic

params.name: level
params.comment: the number of parent menus that this menu is in.

params.name: group
params.comment: the group of this menu.

params.name: usePopupPath
params.comment: if true, registers actions with popup paths as popup items.

params.name: menuHandler
params.comment: Listener to be notified of menu behavior.

params.name: menuGroupMap
params.comment: maps menu groups to menu paths

methods.javadoc:
Adds an action to this menu. Can create subMenus depending on the menuPath of the action
@param action the action to be added
methods.name: addAction
methods.comment: Adds an action to this menu. Can create subMenus depending on the menuPath of the action

params.name: action
params.comment: the action to be added

methods.name: getMnemonicKey
methods.comment: Parses the mnemonic key from the menu items text.

params.name: str
params.comment: the menu item text

return.comment: the mnemonic key for encoded in the actions menu text. Returns 0 if there is none.

methods.name: stripMnemonicAmp
methods.comment: Removes the Mnemonic indicator character () from the text

params.name: text
params.comment: the text to strip

methods.javadoc: Tests if this menu is empty.
methods.name: isEmpty
methods.comment: Tests if this menu is empty.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a Menu hierarchy of all the actions
@return the menu
methods.name: getMenu
methods.comment: Returns a Menu hierarchy of all the actions

methods.javadoc:
Returns a JPopupMenu for the action hierarchy
@return the popup menu
methods.name: getPopupMenu
methods.comment: Returns a JPopupMenu for the action hierarchy

methods.name: menuGroupChanged
methods.comment: Notification that a menu item has changed groups.

params.name: theMenuPath
params.comment: the menu path of the item whose group changed.

params.name: i
params.comment: the index into the menu path of the part that changed groups.

params.name: localGroup
params.comment: the new group.

name: MenuManager
comment: Class to manage a hierarchy of menus.
